at_bat.description: Whit Merrifield grounds out to second base, Brett Lawrie to Jose Abreu.
Alcides Escobar flies out to center field to Adam Eaton.
Jose Abreu singles to right field. Adam Eaton to second.
Melky Cabrera out on a sacrifice bunt to shallow infield, Danny Duffy to Eric Hosmer. Jose Abreu to second. Adam Eaton to third.
